虇字的基本解释

虇
quǎn
芦苇一类植物的嫩芽。
竹笋。

虇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quǎn］
［《廣韻》去阮切，上阮，溪。］
［《廣韻》去願切，去願，溪。］
芦苇嫩芽。亦指芦苇、竹子类植物的嫩芽。

虇字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　虇； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1072第27
【唐韻】去阮切，音綣。【爾雅·釋草】其萌虇。【註】江東呼蘆筍爲虇，則萑葦之類，其初生者皆名虇。　又【廣韻】去願切，音勸。【集韻】連員切，音權。義?同。

虇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
虇字的起名意思

暂无。

Xiao
Basic explanation of words
Xiao
quǎn
The buds of plants such as reeds.
Bamboo shoots.
Xiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quǎn］
["Guangyun" goes to Ruan Qi, Shang Ruan, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" Go Wish Cut, Go Wish, Creek. ]
Reed sprouts. Also refers to the shoots of reeds and bamboo plants.
Xiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　虇; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 1072 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Go to Ruan Qi, sound 绻. 【Erya·Shicao】Its cuteness. 【Note】Jiangdong calls asparagus as 虇, then 萑Wei and the like, and the new born are all named 虇.　[Guang Yun] Go to wish to cut, and persuade. [Jiyun] Even members cut, sound right. Righteous? Same.
